France Hamelin (14 Julaị 1918 9 Machị 2007), a mụrụ France Aline Haberer, bụ onye France na-ese ihe, onye agha na-eme udo, na onye otu French Resistance n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ.

Amụrụ France Aline Haberer n'ụbọchị 12th arrondissement nke Paris, n'ime ezinụlọ Huguenot sitere na Alsace. Ọ tolitere na Lot-et-Garonne, mana ya na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri Paris, wee gụọ akwụkwọ na École normale supérieure de Sèvres
Ọ sonyeere otu onye ọkà ihe ọmụma bụ Émile Chartier, nke a maara dị ka "Alain".

Mgbe agha tiwapụrụ, Haberer, onye na-amụ nka na nkà ihe ọmụma na Bordeaux, sonyeere Resistance, ebe ọ zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, Lucien Hamelin. Ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike mgbe ọ hụchara Vel' d'Hiv Roundup n'afọ 1942, wee malite ichebe ndị Juu n'ụlọ ya
Ya na Lucien, e jidere ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1943, mana ọ gbapụrụ na mbido n'ihi na ọ dị ime
E zigara Lucien n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Buchenwald, mgbe a na-ejide ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ La Roquette
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ide na ise ihe, isiokwu ya bụ ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke ndị mkpọrọ nwanyị. O dekwara akwụkwọ ndekọ, na-edekọ ahụmahụ ha. N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1944, ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke n'ụlọ ọgwụ Paris
Site n'enyemaka nke Michèle Noyer, ya na nwatakịrị ahụ gbapụrụ wee gbaba n'ụlọ onye nọọsụ dị nso na Clairac na mpaghara ya.
Lucien Hamelin lanarịrị Buchenwald wee laghachi n'ụlọ n'afọ 1945; di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ anọ ọzọ

France Hamelin ghọrọ onye nkuzi nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịdị ala, na onye na-eme mkpọsa udo, onye na-emegide ma Agha Algeria na Agha Vietnam. Ọ jụrụ nkwenkwe okpukpe ezinụlọ ya maka ikweghị na Chineke. O mepụtara ihe osise ọzọ, mana egosiri ọrụ ya, mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, na Musée de la Résistance de Châteaubriant.
